definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: "It was slow going in the beginning, " Therese told me.
sentences.chinese: “起初這個事情進行得非常緩慢，”特里薩對我說。

sentences.english: Later, Mother Teresa became very famous.
sentences.chinese: 最後，特里薩嬤嬤變得非常出名。
